answers.answer: Hello,Some of the causes which need to be ruled out in your case are peripheral vascular disease, anticoagulants, diabetes and coagulopathy.You should get it evaluated from a dermatologist as well as a physician to confirm the diagnosis.It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided.
